summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from December 1, 2018, to December 31, 2018. It includes information on debits, credits, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting specific transactions and account management instructions.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the document.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $18,583.52 on December 1, 2018.
A preauthorized debit of $1,462.54 was made on December 12, 2018.
The account incurred service charges totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
An interest payment of $1.49 was credited to the account on December 31, 2018.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
